channel.title: neovim on Mads Kjeldgaard
channel.description: Recent content in neovim on Mads Kjeldgaard

item.title: Setting up NeoVim as a SuperCollider IDE
item.description: SuperCollider-NeoVim setup in use at the wonderful Lysningsrommet at the art academy in Stockholm SuperCollider is my favourite programming language for music and sound and I use it all the time. The programming language comes with an IDE that is quite capable, but I for one prefer doing all of my coding in one editor (sometimes I write C++, lua and SuperCollider in one and the same project) and that editor for me is NeoVim.
